sentences.sContent: I’m going out for a bit – I’ll see you later.
...was later incorporated into the Christian church...
...Only a few months later Leah opened her first yoga studio...
...which will start selling it later this year...
...Brits stayed up a half－hour later to watch it...
...who stayed up around an hour and a haft later on various days throughout the summer to watch the Cup...
...I am sure I wrote essays in the later years of high school without my mother's guidance...
...Russians also get up an hour later on International Women's Day...
...began to wake up about a half-hour later each day after President Vladimir Putin shifted the country permanently to "winter time" starting on October 26...
...it will be difficult for them to acquire a reading habit later in life...

phrases.pCn: adv. 后来；稍后；过些时候

trans.tranOther: after the time you are talking about or after the present time
